articles.title: Netflix to spend $1bn in UK in 2020 on TV shows and films - The Guardian
articles.description: Exclusive: streaming giant ups budget by 50% as Disney also invests in production facilities at Pinewood Studios
articles.content:
Netflix will boost its spend on making TV shows in the UK to $1bn (£750m) this year as the streaming giant maintains the breakneck pace of its production pipeline despite the coronavirus pandemic.
